content: Guild, at the graveyard. Raphael will be waiting for you near the entrance if you have the Quest Kill Raphael’s Old Enemy active, along with its corresponding part of the Companion Quest The Pale Elf. When you go through the iron fence, you’ll hear a talking skull telling you to beat it, but it won’t do anything else if you interact with it.
